amendment.description: To require a report on New World screwworm readiness and response.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3073 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3073 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3411. To require a report on New World screwworm readiness and response.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3073 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3073 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
